src:
5 Rekomendasi Drama Korea Terlaris Oktober 2019
03 Nov 2019, 11:45 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Serial 'When the Camellia Blooms' berbeda dari kebanyakan drama Korea bergenre romansa komedi lainnya. (dok. KBS Drama via imdb.com)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Selama Oktober 2019, sejumlah drama romansa komedi menguasai pertelevisian Korea Selatan. Beberapa di antaranya mengambil latar belakang sageuk (kerajaan), seperti The Tale of Nokdu dan Flower Crew: Joseon Marriage.Berikut lima rekomendasi drama Korea terpopuler edisi Oktober versi CNNIndonesia.com.Extraordinary YouExtraordinary You merupakan drama bergenre romansa komedi yang dipadu dengan fantasi. Drama ini dibintangi Kim Hye-yoon, Kim Ro-woon SF9 dan Lee Jae-wook.Extraordinary You bercerita tentang Eun Dan-oh (Kim Hye-yoon), seorang siswi berusia 17 tahun. Ia datang dari keluarga kaya raya, tetapi menderita penyakit jantung.Dan-oh kemudian menyadari memiliki masalah dengan ingatan. Hal ini berujung pada terkuaknya fakta bahwa dirinya merupakan karakter webtoon. Sehingga, seluruh kejadian dalam hidupnya ditentukan oleh pembuat webtoon.Dan-oh bagai menelan pil pahit, terlebih ia hanya karakter pendukung dalam webtoon. Ia pun berniat menemukan jalan hidup serta kisah cintanya sendiri.Extraordinary You mendapatkan rating tertinggi 3.3 persen untuk penayangan pekan ini. Drama ini bisa disaksikan di Viu tiap Kamis dan Jumat.



Flower Crew: Joseon MarriageFlower Crew : Joseon Marriage Agency bergenre romansa komedi dengan unsur historis yang menceritakan tentang seorang raja di era Joseon. Tak dapat melupakan cinta pertamanya, sang raja meminta pertolongan dari agensi biro jodoh bernama Flower Crew.Flower Crew: Joseon Marriage Agency diadaptasi dari novel berjudul Kkotpadang: Joseonhondamgongjakso karya Kim Yi-Rang, terbit pada 2014. Kim Yi-Rang ikut menulis naskah untuk drama yang dibintangi Seo Ji-hoon, Gong Seung-yoon, Kim Min-jae, Park Ji-hoon dan Byun Woo-seok ini.Flower Crew: Joseon Marriage Agency mendapatkan rating tertinggi 3,7 persen untuk episode yang tayang pekan ini. Drama ini bisa disaksikan tiap Kamis dan Jumat di Viu.



The Tale of NokduThe Tale of Nokdu menceritakan tentang perjuangan Nokdu mencari tahu misteri penyerangan terhadap keluarganya. Hal itu membuat Nokdu masuk ke kampung misterius yang hanya ditinggali para perempuan.Demi mencari tahu jawaban, ia rela menyamar sebagai seorang perempuan untuk masuk ke desa tersebut. Namun, penyamaran tersebut membuat Nokdu jadi terlibat dalam banyak hal. Ia pun sampai sempat mengangkat anak di desa tersebut.Di tengah-tengah perjuangan mengungkapkan misteri, Nokdu dihadapkan dengan kenyataan yang tak pernah dibayangkan sebelumnya.The Tale of Nokdu dibintangi oleh Jang Dong-yoo, Kim So-hyun dan Kang Tae-oh. Drama yang mendapatkan rating sekitar 5,7 persen di episode terbarunya ini bisa disaksikan di Viu tiap Selasa dan Rabu.



VagabondVagabond merupakan drama laga serta misteri yang dibintangi Lee Seung-gi dengan Bae Suzy. Kisah mereka dimulai ketika sebuah pesawat mengalami kecelakaan dan menewaskan 211 orang di dalamnya, termasuk keponakan Cha Dal-gun (Lee Seung-gi).Hal itu membuat Cha Dal-gun yang sehari-hari bekerja sebagai stuntman karena kecintaannya terhadap Jackie Chan ingin menyelidiki penyebab kecelakaan tersebut.Sementara Go Hae-ri (Bae Suzy) sedang bertugas sebagai agen rahasia di Kedutaan Besar Korea di Maroko saat kecelakaan pesawat terjadi.Vagabond mendapatkan rating 9,7 persen untuk episode terbarunya pekan ini. Drama ini bisa disaksikan tiap Jumat dan Sabtu di Netflix.



When the Camellia BloomsWhen the Camellia Blooms menceritakan kisah Dongbaek (Camellia) yang tinggal sebagai pendatang baru di kawasan Ongsan. Kehadirannya menjadi perbincangan para tetangga karena Dongbaek merupakan ibu tunggal yang memiliki seorang anak laki-laki.Di Ongsan, Dongbaek terlibat hubungan rumit dengan tiga laki-laki, yakni seorang polisi, pengusaha sekaligus politikus dan atlet.Drama yang dibintangi Gong Hyo-jin, Kang Ha-neul dan Kim Ji-seok ini berbeda dengan drama romansa komedi kebanyakan karena para tokoh tak pernah basa-basi dalam mengutarakan perasaan satu dengan yang lain.Tak hanya itu, When the Camellia Blooms juga menyimpan banyak misteri yang membuat drama ini layak ditunggu tiap minggunya. Seperti pada minggu terakhir, drama ini meraih rating sekitar 15,1 persen.When the Camellia Blooms bisa disaksikan di Netflix tiap Kamis dan Jumat.




(chri/rea)
text:
5 Best-selling Korean Drama Recommendations October 2019
03 Nov 2019, 11:45 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


The series 'When the Camellia Blooms' is different from most other Korean drama comedy genre acts. (doc. KBS Drama via imdb.com)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - During October 2019, a number of comedy romance dramas dominated South Korean television. Some of them take the background of sageuk (kingdom), such as The Tale of Nokdu and Flower Crew: Joseon Marriage. Here are five recommendations for the most popular Korean drama in the October edition of CNNIndonesia.com. Extraordinary You Extraordinary You is a comedy genre drama combined with fantasy. The drama stars Kim Hye-yoon, Kim Ro-woon SF9 and Lee Jae-wook. Extraordinary You tells the story of Eun Dan-oh (Kim Hye-yoon), a 17-year-old female student. He came from a wealthy family, but suffered from heart disease. And-oh then realized he had a problem with memory. This led to the fact that he was revealed as a webtoon character. Thus, all the events in his life are determined by the webtoon maker. He also intends to find a way of life and his own love story. Extraordinary You get the highest rating of 3.3 percent for this week's views. This drama can be watched in Viu every Thursday and Friday.



Flower Crew: Joseon MarriageFlower Crew: Joseon Marriage Agency is a comedy romance genre with historical elements that tell of a king in the Joseon era. Unable to forget his first love, the king asked for help from a matchmaking agency called Flower Crew. Flower Crew: Joseon Marriage Agency was adapted from a novel titled Kkotpadang: Joseonhondamgongjakso by Kim Yi-Rang, published in 2014. Kim Yi-Rang co-wrote the script for the drama starring Seo Ji-hoon, Gong Seung-yoon, Kim Min-jae, Park Ji-hoon and Byun Woo-seok.Flower Crew: Joseon Marriage Agency received the highest rating of 3.7 percent for episodes this week. This drama can be witnessed every Thursday and Friday at Viu.



The Tale of Nokdu The Tale of Nokdu tells about Nokdu's struggle to find out the mystery of the attack on his family. This made Nokdu enter a mysterious village where only women lived. For the sake of finding answers, he was willing to disguise himself as a woman to enter the village. However, this disguise made Nokdu become involved in many things. He also had the opportunity to raise children in the village. In the midst of the struggle to reveal the mystery, Nokdu was confronted with a reality that was never imagined before. The Tale of Nokdu starred Jang Dong-yoo, Kim So-hyun and Kang Tae-oh. The drama which gets a rating of around 5.7 percent in this latest episode can be watched in Viu every Tuesday and Wednesday.



VagabondVagabond is an action and mystery drama starring Lee Seung Gi with Bae Suzy. Their story begins when an airplane crashes and kills 211 people on board, including Cha Dal-gun's nephew (Lee Seung-gi). This makes Cha Dal-gun, who works as a stuntman, because of his love for Jackie Chan wanting to investigate the cause the accident. While Go Hae-ri (Bae Suzy) was on duty as a secret agent at the Korean Embassy in Morocco when the plane crash occurred. Nagabond received a 9.7 percent rating for his latest episode this week. This drama can be watched every Friday and Saturday on Netflix.



When the Camellia Blooms When the Camellia Blooms told the story of Dongbaek (Camellia) who lived as a newcomer to the Ongsan region. Her presence became the talk of the neighbors because Dongbaek was a single mother who had a son. In Ongsan, Dongbaek was involved in a complicated relationship with three men, namely a police officer, a businessman as well as a politician and athlete. The hostel starring Gong Hyo-jin, Kang Kang Ha-neul and Kim Ji-seok are different from most romantic comedy dramas because the characters never make lip service in expressing one another's feelings. Not only that, When the Camellia Blooms also holds many mysteries that make this drama worth waiting for each the week As in the last week, this drama received a rating of around 15.1 percent. When the Camellia Blooms can be watched on Netflix every Thursday and Friday.




(chri / rea)
